summary: This is an email chain from September 2, 2021, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's detention at MDC. Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim notifies the Bureau of Prisons about a third-party interference incident with Maxwell's secure Webex line for privileged attorney-client communication, witnessed by an MDC staff member. The email includes a forwarded misdirected message and a request for an explanation.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell, notifying the Bureau of Prisons about interference with secure attorney-client communications and referencing a court order.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The accused individual whose secure video conference communication with her counsel was reportedly interfered with, as observed at the conclusion of a VTC session.

persons.name: Christian Everdel
persons.context: Copied on the main email from Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding the interference with Ghislaine Maxwell's communication line.

connections.description: Sternheim is the defense attorney representing Maxwell, as evidenced by her notifying authorities about interference with their privileged communications.

events.title: Interference with Maxwell's Secure VTC
events.description: At the conclusion of a video teleconference (VTC) session, Ghislaine Maxwell observed suspicious activity on the monitor indicating third-party interference with the secure Webex line used for confidential attorney-client communication. She alerted MDC staff, and a Case Manager witnessed the activity.

events.title: Court Order Issued
events.description: The court issued an order referenced by Attorney Sternheim, which likely pertained to the conditions of Ghislaine Maxwell's communication with her legal counsel.

locations: FMC Butner (Federal Medical Center, Butner, North Carolina, mentioned as the location of an attorney)
keyFacts: Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim reported a new incident of third-party interference with the secure Webex line used for Ghislaine Maxwell's privileged attorney-client communications.
The interference was directly observed by Maxwell at the end of a VTC session on September 1, 2021, and was witnessed by an MDC Case Manager.
This incident contradicts prior government and MDC Legal assurances that Maxwell's difficulties communicating with counsel had been resolved.
The communication is in reference to a court order dated August 25, 2021, concerning Maxwell's conditions of confinement.
The email chain includes a misdirected message, indicating the sensitive nature of the correspondence and potential for error in handling.
